title: Texans-Saints, Broncos-Raiders MNF Previews/Insider Notes with Jason La Canfora (Football 9/9)
description:
On this Monday afternoon edition of the Pick Six NFL podcast, Jared Dubin joins Will Brinson to help break down 2 Monday Night Football games and brag a little about the Cowboys and Kellen Moore (1:30). The guys discuss whether the Texans can protect Deshaun Watson enough to keep up with the Saints (6:00) and what will happen with the Raiders in Week 1 against the Broncos now that they are seemingly past the Antonio Brown saga (16:00). Then, Jason La Canfora joins Will (27:00) to sort through Sunday's storylines including what the Jags do now at QB without Nick Foles (28:30), if the Browns should be panicking (34:00), the latest on AB (42:00), plus a shoutout to all the Lamar Jackson haters (50:00). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
